attributes.action: Remove Anonymity from all social media platforms
attributes.additional_details: It is shocking that people feel at liberty to post on social media the things they do, such disgusting hateful things, children are subject to the most hurtful and damaging postings and messages.  Adults are subjected to death threats ... This needs to stop, the individuals that feel the need to post such things must be held accountable and punished, hiding behind alas's should come to an end.  Something needs doing NOW the government have to now take action to protect the vulnerable
attributes.background: By removing anonymity it will enable all social media to police their postings for hate and bullying and in so doing, identifying these people so action can be taken to ban them from all social media, and if need be take police action

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Require social media accounts to be identifiable, not anonymous
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581485
